About

Professional

Public servant at the State University of Health Sciences of Alagoas performing activities in the area of systems development using the technologies JSF (JavaServer Faces), Primefaces and Hibernate.

Developer at Center of Innovation - EDGE at University Federal of Alagoas

Researcher

I am currently participate in research groups at the University Federal of Alagoas in field of Software Engineering applied to Machine Learning, more specifically in machine learning debugging, which is to understand how machine learning techniques have achieved a certain result.
